!Master Iker: The jewel bought at auction? Yes. So you noticed? That jewel is not an ordinary gem. I also felt a strong magical power emanating from the jewel, which is why I purchased it in the first place. But did you also perceive that the powers emitted from this jewel have a strong sense of... darkness. So promise me that you'll not use this jewel for evil purposes. [Quest _229_TestOfWitchcraft 30110-02.htm|I promise.]
